00020 
00036 #define _MASTER(dev)    ((MINOR(dev)            == 0xc0)
00037 #define _SPECIAL(dev)   ((MINOR(dev)&0xe0)      == 0xc0)
00038 #define _CHANNEL(dev)   ((MINOR(dev)&0x80)      == 0x00)
00039 #define _FILE(dev)      ((MINOR(dev)&0xf0)      == 0x80)
00040 #define _RSH(dev) \
00041         (MINOR(dev)==227 || MINOR(dev)==228 || \
00042         MINOR(dev)==229 || MINOR(dev)==237)
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * IF _CHANNEL, minor devices code for channel
00046  *
00047  * normal channel device returns data as a column for the channel
00048  * space for 0..63 channels
00049  */
00050 
00051 #define IS_CHANNEL_DEV(dev)    _CHANNEL(dev)
00052  
00053 #define CHANNEL(dev)    (_CHANNEL(dev)? (MINOR(dev)&0x7f): -1)
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * IF SPECIAL, minor devices code for mastership, ROM or SPECIAL2
00057  */
00058 
00059 #define IS_MASTER(dev)      (_MASTER(dev))
00060 
00061 #define SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)  (_SPECIAL(dev)? MINOR(dev)&0x1f: 0 )
00062 
00063 #define IS_FILE(dev)    (_FILE(dev))
00064 #define IS_RSH(dev)     (_RSH(dev))
00065 
00066 #define IS_ROM(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==0)
00067 #define ROWDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==0x1f)
00068 #define DEVRAW(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==1)
00069 #define DEVDMABUF(dev)  (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==2)
00070 #define BIGDUMPDEV(dev) (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==3)
00071 #define AOIDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==4)
00072 #define AOFDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==5)
00073 #define DOIDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==6)
00074 #define DOFDEV(dev)     (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==7)
00075 
00076 #define AOFRDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==8)
00077 #define DOFRDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==9)
00078 #define STATDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==10)
00079 #define LLHOSTDEV(dev)  (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==11)
00080 
00081 
00082 #define TESTDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)==15)
00083 #define TFTPDEV(dev)    (_SPECIAL(dev) && (SPECIAL_FLAGS(dev)&0x10))
00084 
00085 #define HAS_SLAVE( n )  ((SLAVES(dev)&(1<<(n-1)) != 0)
